1-ch-16-11.kjv: Seek the LORD and his strength, seek his face continually.
1-ch-16-11.modernized: Seek the LORD and his strength, seek his face continually.

1-jn-5-14b.kjv: if we ask any thing according to his will, he heareth us:
1-jn-5-14b.modernized: If we ask anything according to his will, he hears us.

jb-22-27.kjv: Thou shalt make thy prayer unto him, and he shall hear thee, and thou shalt pay thy vows.
jb-22-27.modernized: Make your prayer to him, and he will hear you, and you shall pay your vows.

mt-6-9.kjv: After this manner therefore pray ye: Our Father which art in heaven, Hallowed be thy name
mt-6-9.modernized: In this manner therefore pray: Our Father who is in heaven, Hallowed is your name.

ph-4-16b.kjv: but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God.
ph-4-16b.modernized: But in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known to God.

ro-8-26c.kjv: but the Spirit itself maketh intercession for us with groanings which cannot be uttered.
ro-8-26c.modernized: But the Spirit itself makes intercession for us with groanings which cannot be uttered.
